Description:
As you venture forward, a scorching trail sears its mark upon the grass, leaving a path of charred vegetation in its wake. Your attention is drawn to a pair of piercing yellow eyes that meet yours, and in that instant, the enigmatic nature of the Dragonsworn becomes clear. 
The Dragonsworn, embodying the essence of their dragon lineage, come in a myriad of colors that mirror their affinity to elemental forces. From the fiery red scales symbolizing a connection to flames, to the electric hues representing a mastery over lightning, each Dragonsworn bears a unique chromatic expression of their power. Some may display majestic wings, capable of carrying them through the skies with grace, while others brandish horns and tails that serve as physical manifestations of their Drakan heritage.
Speaking a language known as Drakan, a complex tongue of breaths and resonating shouts, the Dragonsworn wield a formidable ability to harness the elemental forces within them. Through their breath, they can unleash torrents of flame, bolts of lightning, icy gusts, or other elemental manifestations, harnessing and mastering their power to devastating effect. Born from eggs rather than nurtured within mammals, the Dragonsworn possess a profound connection to the cycles of life and rebirth, their hatching representing the emergence of ancient wisdom and raw potential.

Creation.Stat Restrictions: Your Intelligence and Might must be at least 1.

Language: You speak Common and a number of chosen languages equal to your Intelligence or Charisma, whichever is higher, of which one must be Drakan. Drakan is the ancient language of dragons that relies on conveying powerful messages through short words, shouts and dragon breath.
Other: Dragonsworn have tails, though you can choose not to have one.

~Dragon Ancestry~.Effect:
When creating your character, choose any element from Acid, Cold, Fire, Shock, Pulse, Poison and Scourge.
You take -50% Damage from that Damage type.
~Dragon Ancestry~.Notes: The color of your skin and scales as a Dragonsworn should reflect the element you chose (e.g. Cold might be associated with white or blue Dragonswarne).

Starting Abilities Description.Color and Element:
When you create your character, choose your Dragonsworn's color/element combination.
Then, you will choose the shape you want to be able to breathe your element in.

Starting Abilities Description.Area Shapes:
If you are playing on a grid, check the Area Shapes section to see how the Cone will look.
Breath - Line can be centered with either the left or right or diagonal starting square directly in front of you (so it might be slightly to the left or slightly to the right).

~Dragon Breath - Area~.Effect: Breathe in a 3x3 meter area, dealing 2d6 + 2 Damage (of your Dragonsworn Element) to all Units caught in the area.
~Dragon Breath - Area~.Notes: You can use this if you didn't use it last turn.

~Dragon Breath - Line~.Effect: Breathe in a 8 meter long (1 meter thick) line~, dealing 2d6 + 2 Damage (of your Dragonsworn Element) to all Units caught in the area.
~Dragon Breath - Line~.Notes: You can use this if you didn't use it last turn.

~Dragon Breath - Blast~.Effect: Breathe on all Units within 2 meters of you, dealing 2d6 + 2 Damage (of your Dragonsworn Element) to all Units caught in the area.
~Dragon Breath - Blast~.Notes: You can use this if you didn't use it last turn.

Ability Choices Description: As a Dragonsworn, you can choose how your Dragon's Breath has evolved.

~Second Skin~.Effect:
Choose one more Element from Dragon Ancestry
You take -50% Damage from that Damage type.
You can freely change Dragon's Breath to that element.

~Forceful Breath~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now deals 2d8 + 3 Damage, but is only usable Once / Combat.

~Breath Control~.Effect: All Units affected by Dragon's Breath must make a Might Check or be pushed 3 meters away from you.

~Primal Wyrmkin~.Requirement: You may only get this Ability on Character Creation
~Primal Wyrmkin~.Effect:
Your arms are covered in a membrane that spans all the way to your waist, and your form more closely resembles a feral dragon.
Your Max Health decreases by 3 and you may not use Weapons, Shields or Heavy Armor, but your Intelligence increases by 1 (up to +4), Dragon's Breath Damage deals extra Damage equal to your Intelligence, and you also gain the Wingspan Ability.

~Hulking Dracontaur~.Requirement: You may only get this Ability on Character Creation
~Hulking Dracontaur~.Effect:
Your lower body is 4-legged, like a draconic-centaur, and your size is Large.
Your Health Regen decreases by 2 and your Dexterity by 1, but your Might increases by +1 (up to +4) and, while Unarmored, you have +1 Defense instead of +1 Movement Speed.

~Wingspan~.Effect: Quickly fly up to 3 meters (e.g. almost instantly).
